cz.artin.hackathon.simulator

Class Way

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.artin.hackathon.simulator.Way

  • public class Way
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes path you should drive by. It is a polyline defined by points and its width. It also has some utility methods.
